outline:
1. goodness, kindness, faithfulness
  2. a reproach, shame
kjv_def: favour, good deed(-liness, -ness), kindly, (loving-) kindness, merciful (kindness), mercy, pity, reproach, wicked thing.
strongs_def: kindness; by implication (towards God) piety; rarely (by opposition) reproof, or (subject.) beauty
